languages.text: "Что же, это было предсказуемо. Вольного Торговца устроит компания контрабандистки, но {mf|ему|ей} не по чину терпеть в свите простолюдинку и дезертиршу. Постараюсь впредь не оскорблять твой величественный взор своей скромной персоной".

"Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."
languages.original_text: "Что же, это было предсказуемо. Вольного Торговца устроит компания контрабандистки, но {mf|ему|ей} не по чину терпеть в свите простолюдинку и дезертиршу. Постараюсь впредь не оскорблять твой величественный взор своей скромной персоной".

traits.locale_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in his retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

"Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in his retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

"Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in his retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

"Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in his retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

languages.text: «Bueno, eso era predecible. A{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente no le molesta la presencia de una contrabandista. Pero ¿tener a una plebeya desertora en su séquito? Eso es mucho pedir. Desde ahora me aseguraré de no molestar a su majestuosa mirada con mi presencia».
languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, eso era predecible. A{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente no le molesta la presencia de una contrabandista. Pero ¿tener a una plebeya desertora en su séquito? Eso es mucho pedir. Desde ahora me aseguraré de no molestar a su majestuosa mirada con mi presencia».

languages.text: “好吧，这并不令人意外。行商浪人与走私者为伴还算可以接受，可容忍一介平民，一个逃兵成为随行人员？不行，这恐怕太过分了。从现在起，我将尽我所能，不让我卑微的身份玷污你威严的目光。”
languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，这并不令人意外。行商浪人与走私者为伴还算可以接受，可容忍一介平民，一个逃兵成为随行人员？不行，这恐怕太过分了。从现在起，我将尽我所能，不让我卑微的身份玷污你威严的目光。”

languages.text: 「思った通りね。自由開拓者は密輸者と親しくなるのは平気だけど、従者にいる平民や逃亡者とは嫌々付き合ってくれるのね？いいえ、それはさすがに行き過ぎよね？これからは謙虚なあたしがあんたのその崇高なまなざしを傷つけないよう努めるわ」
languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

traits.locale_text: 「思った通りね。自由開拓者は密輸者と親しくなるのは平気だけど、従者にいる平民や逃亡者とは嫌々付き合ってくれるのね？いいえ、それはさすがに行き過ぎよね？これからは謙虚なあたしがあんたのその崇高なまなざしを傷つけないよう努めるわ」

languages.text: « Ma foi, c'était prévisible. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} accepte volontiers la compagnie d'une contrebandière, mais de là à tolérer une roturière doublée d'une déserteuse dans son cercle rapproché ? Non, il ne faut quand même pas pousser. Dorénavant, je m'efforcerai de ne plus offenser votre auguste regard par ma présence vulgaire. »
languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi, c'était prévisible. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} accepte volontiers la compagnie d'une contrebandière, mais de là à tolérer une roturière doublée d'une déserteuse dans son cercle rapproché ? Non, il ne faut quand même pas pousser. Dorénavant, je m'efforcerai de ne plus offenser votre auguste regard par ma présence vulgaire. »

languages.text: "Tja, das war vorhersehbar. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat nichts gegen die Gesellschaft von Schmugglern einzuwenden, aber Bürgerliche und Deserteure in {mf|seinem|ihrem} Gefolge? Nein, das geht zu weit. Von nun an werde ich mich bemühen, Euren majestätischen Blick nicht mehr durch meine demütige Person zu beleidigen."
languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

traits.locale_text: "Tja, das war vorhersehbar. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat nichts gegen die Gesellschaft von Schmugglern einzuwenden, aber Bürgerliche und Deserteure in {mf|seinem|ihrem} Gefolge? Nein, das geht zu weit. Von nun an werde ich mich bemühen, Euren majestätischen Blick nicht mehr durch meine demütige Person zu beleidigen."

languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in his retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

languages.text: "Böyle olacağını tahmin etmiştim. Hür Tacir, bir kaçakçıyla beraber hareket etmekte beis görmüyor ama maiyetinde ayaktakımından bir asker kaçağı bulunmasını tolere edemiyor, öyle mi? Hayır, bu da fazla ileri gitmek olurdu. Şu andan itibaren senin o haşmetli gözlerini, benim bu naçiz şahsıma katlanma zahmetinden kurtarıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Well, that was predictable. The Rogue Trader is fine with the company of a smuggler, but tolerating a commoner and a deserter in {mf|his|her} retinue? No, that is a step too far. From now on, I will endeavour not to offend your majestic gaze with my humble person."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle olacağını tahmin etmiştim. Hür Tacir, bir kaçakçıyla beraber hareket etmekte beis görmüyor ama maiyetinde ayaktakımından bir asker kaçağı bulunmasını tolere edemiyor, öyle mi? Hayır, bu da fazla ileri gitmek olurdu. Şu andan itibaren senin o haşmetli gözlerini, benim bu naçiz şahsıma katlanma zahmetinden kurtarıyorum."
